name: Provocative Operation
description: Systematic use of deliberate provocations to escape conventional thinking patterns

steps.name: Create Provocations - Generate challenging statements
steps.description:
Deliberately create provocative, challenging, or seemingly impossible statements

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Create deliberate provocations: 'What if we had zero budget?', 'What if this problem didn't exist?', 'What if we did the exact opposite?', 'What if we had unlimited resources?', 'What if we started from scratch?'. Make statements that challenge fundamental assumptions.

steps.name: Suspend Judgment - Accept the provocations
steps.description: Temporarily accept the provocative statements without immediate judgment or dismissal

steps.name: Extract Movement - Find useful directions
steps.description:
Extract useful concepts, directions, or insights from the provocative statements

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Extract movement from the provocations: What useful concepts emerge? What new directions become visible? Even if the provocation is impossible, what aspects could be adapted? What principles or approaches does it suggest?

steps.name: Develop Practical Ideas - Transform insights
steps.description: Transform the provocative insights into practical, implementable ideas

steps.name: Iterate with New Provocations - Continue the process
steps.description: Create new provocations based on emerging insights and continue the process
